title: 97/298/EC: Commission Decision of 23 April 1997 amending Decision 96/742/EC drawing up a list of border inspection posts agreed for veterinary checks on products and animals from third countries and laying down detailed rules concerning the checks to be carried out by the veterinary experts of the Commission (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 23 April 1997 amending Decision 96/742/EC drawing up a list of border inspection posts agreed for veterinary checks on products and animals from third countries and laying down detailed rules concerning the checks to be carried out by the veterinary experts of the Commission (Text with EEA relevance) (97/298/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Annex to Decision 96/742/EC is amended as follows:
In the section concerning Spain, the references relating to the border inspection post of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria are replaced by the following:
>TABLE>
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 April 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1990, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 162, 1. 7. 1996, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 56.
(4) OJ No L 338, 28. 12. 1996, p. 91.
(5) OJ No L 64, 5. 3. 1997, p. 19.
